item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Kylie Minogue - Steve Anderson Studio Versions (Lossless)
item.description:
I am looking for the Steve Anderson Studio versions from the Live In New York album. They where iTunes exclusives but they are on Apple Music so I'm wondering if they use lossless sources for Apple Music and if someone can rip them for me in WAV or FLAC for me if possible

https://music.apple.com/us/song/speakerphone-steve-anderson-studio-version/731934648
https://music.apple.com/us/album/light-years-steve-anderson-studio-version/731934361?i=731934647
https://music.apple.com/us/album/co...anderson-studio-version/731934361?i=731934650

Also looking for any over X era Steve Anderson Studio Versions In Lossless (WAV, FLAC, AIFF or ALAC) especially LIke A Drug

Thank you
David Miller
item.author: HeBop2012
